#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<cctype>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>                        
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define f(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define Sd(a) scanf("%d",&a);
#define Ss(a) scanf("%s",&a);

int main() {
	int t;
	Sd(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		Sd(n);bool f=1;
		int rem = n%7;
		int ques = n/7;
		while(f)
		{
			
			if(rem%4==0)
			{
				f=0;
				cout<<ques*7<<"\n";
			}
			else
			{
				if(ques>1)
				{
					rem+=7;
					ques-=1;
				}
				else 
				{
					f=0;
					cout<<"-1"<<"\n";
				}
			}
		}
		
	}
	return 0;
}
